sources.label: Candle Making Calculator Compute wax, fragrance load, and dye for any vessel size.
Epoxy Resin Calculator Measure resin & hardener by area, thickness, and mix ratio.
Knitting Gauge Calculator Convert swatch stitches/rows into accurate project sizing.

Paint Mixing Calculator Mix custom colors and volumes with exact proportions.
Sewing Yardage Calculator Estimate fabric yardage by width, size, and pattern pieces.
Yarn Calculator Approximate yarn needed by project size, gauge, and stitch.
Depth of Field (DoF) Calculator Get near/far focus, hyperfocal distance, and blur circle.
